original_title: Vivaldi - The Four Seasons / Von Karajan, Mutter, Berlin Philharmonic
overview: Famed conductor Herbert Von Karajan leads the Berlin Philharmonic in a performance of what may be Vivaldi's best-known composition -- "The Four Seasons" -- in this sparkling video. Recorded in 1987 at the Chamber Music Hall, this concert features Anne-Sophie Mutter as a guest violin soloist.
title: Vivaldi - The Four Seasons / Von Karajan, Mutter, Berlin Philharmonic
